Core:Properties.Core:Property: "This person is a petite brawny wolf, with uneven, matted black fur, and long red hair. Small black eyes are set above a pert nose and a cruel mouth, complete with curved lips. Short ragged nails, on ragged hands, and dirty feet are also visible. You also note its narrow ears and long muzzle."
"This person is a petite brawny wolf, with uneven, matted black fur, and long red hair."
